Name: Plumber 3
About the game: The Plumber 3 is a popular logical game, whose goal is to connect two water points in a short time to drain the water. This game has 30 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity, and the game is ideally suited for mobile devices. Challenge yourself. How quickly can you complete all the levels? Earn stars and complete more levels. - PC controls: Mouse. - pleasant music - cute graphics - added new levels - change graphic
